document.full_text: crews used controlled backfires early sunday to blunt the advance of a major wildfire near mountain communities in eastern arizona, a blaze that has already burned through 225 square miles of forest and brush.
document.title: crews try to control wildfires in arizona
lines_and_colors: crews used controlled backfires early sunday to blunt the advance of a major wildfire near mountain communities in eastern arizona, a blaze that has already burned through 225 square miles of forest and brush.
